sources.title: The House Of The Spaniard
sources.description: A mild-mannered young British man finds himself caught up in a web of smuggling, counterfeiting and political chicanery, and falls for a beautiful Spanish se√±orita whose father is one of the heads of the criminal gangs threatening him.

metadata.Plot: A mild-mannered young British man finds himself caught up in a web of smuggling, counterfeiting and political chicanery, and falls for a beautiful Spanish senorita whose father is one of the heads of the criminal gangs threatening him.
metadata.Actors: Brigitte Horney, Peter Haddon, Jean Galland
